Text: thanks bro, does this have build-up?
As always thanks, as a fan of yours "I" always know what to expect and that's great post "always".

Just for clarity, I always upload the entire broadcast - literally from the first to the last frame...

The discription is copied from tvguide.co.uk & then I use media info for the rest - I was sort of hoping that people would realise that the file duration being (in this case)  2h 18mn meant the whole show was being shared. :)
No need to change anything TDMK1, We know what were getting every race weekend! Thanks...

Thanks So much TDMK1 .

As many people have said, you DONT have to change ANYTHING ! .... I as many other, have enjoyed all of your uploads and dont need to ask for petty things or info.

So please keep up the great work and dont change a thing ! 

Thanks again !
Thanks, as always, TDMK1.  This is the best coverage of F1 and you are the most reliable provider for those of us that can't watch the BBC.  On behalf of all expats everywhere - thank you!

Does it have a buildup? lol It's the fucking BBC. yak yak mother fucking yak. Eddie Jordan? Shut the fuck up you little pimple. I like their race coverage, just hate all the blabbing about dumbshit just to fill the show.

Hey mate! Great Job on the quality :) 

By the way any chance of you uploading the British GP?
Thanks so much for the time and effort you put in to each race weekend TDMK1.  Your work is very much appreciated.
